name: time value
desc: Parse a TVF file consisting of dates, values, and (optionally) labels.

properties.name: Label Options
properties.desc: The Label Options control which label is read from the file.  If 'Use Previous' is selected the last set label before the Current Date will be used.  If 'Use Closest' is selected the label closest to the date will be used.

properties.name: Date And Time
properties.desc: The Date and Time of interest.

properties.name: Time Loop
properties.desc: The Time Loop controls setting the Date and Time by specified increments.

properties.name: Start Date
properties.desc: The Start Date is the beginning time of the simulation.  This value is set to the first date in the file.

properties.name: End Date
properties.desc: The End Date is the end time for the simulation.  This value is set to the last date in the file.

properties.name: Step Time Units
properties.desc: The Step Time Units specify the increment for adavancement when stepping or running.

properties.name: Step Size
properties.desc: The Step Size value specifies a factor, along with the Step Time Units, for the increment for adavancement when stepping or running.

properties.name: Current Date And Time Value
properties.desc: The value interpolated from the file using the set Date And Time.

properties.name: Current Date And Time Label
properties.desc: The string set from the file using the set Date And Time.
